channel.title: DensityPk 317
channel.description:
Densitypk-317-Loading 600+
Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.densitypkz.smfnew.com/"]http://www.densitypkz.smfnew.com/[/URL] Play Now: [URL=http://"http://densitypk.site40.net/densitypk_webclient_stable.html"]http://densitypk.site40.net/densitypk_webclient_stable.html[/URL]
We have a very helpful community who is will to help out almost anyone. Our staff is very nice to anyone that is not staff.
Daily updates to Server and Client.(Client updates are less frequent however.)
-0.8% Dungeoneering -Loading 600+ -Elite Slayer Tasks -Dicing -God Wars -Tormented Demons -Mithril Dragon -Dragon Ore -Dragon Bar -New Dragon Pickaxes -Loyalty Titles -Achievements(Currently 2-Reward is a title) -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Combat levels up to 138 -Godsword Crafting -Extended GP System -Chaotics -Nex Armour -Webclient -Downloadable Client(Never has to be updated) -Dedicated Server
God Wars [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/godwars.png[/img]
Dicing(With Dice Bag) [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/dicing2.png[/img]
Dicer Icon [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/dicinga.png[/img]
Titles [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/titles.png[/img] [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/titles-.png[/img]
Dragon Ore, Bars, and Pickaxes(The red dragon pickaxe is available just not shown) [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/dragitems.png[/img]
Working Ice Barrage [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/icebarrage.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/tormenteddemons.png[/img]
Achievements for a title reward [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/titleachievement.png[/img]
Lootshare! [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/lootshare-.png[/img]
Summoning [IMG]http://densitypk.site40.net/serverres/shop1-.png[/img]
Looking for staff More Images will come when new features are added or there is something i missed.

item.title: DensityPk 317
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Need to work on getting some webhosting supplies and what not, free forums aren’t all that attractive. As for the server itself, I would PROBABLY go with stating it’s decent.

Read full topic

item.title: DensityPk 317
item.dc:creator: @Pinx Pinx
item.description:
@Pinx wrote:

I'm not sure I would support having the ability to make dragon items however good luck! Also, how does this effect required smithing levels?

lol i know the idea is a bit odd but its different. You get a better smithing xp boost but the ore drops are rare or uncommon.

Edit: [Below]i like some of the ideas

Read full topic

item.title: DensityPk 317
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m not sure I would support having the ability to make dragon items however good luck! Also, how does this effect required smithing levels?

edit: I do like the fact though that custom ideas are being made.

perhaps take a look at some of my ideas here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
